channel.title: Comments on: Road tripping the USA

item.title: By: Four months of South America in photos - Duff's Suitcase
item.dc:creator: Four months of South America in photos - Duff's Suitcase
item.description: […] second part of this year-long around-the-world trip (after a three-month stint in the USA), was South America, a continent I had never visited. It had always seemed so far from South […]
item.content:encoded: […] second part of this year-long around-the-world trip (after a three-month stint in the USA), was South America, a continent I had never visited. It had always seemed so far from South […]

item.title: By: Hussain
item.dc:creator: Hussain
item.description: Loved the blog and the pics. This trip has been on my bucket list for ages. Hope you're penning a coffee table book for wannabe US road-trippers like me;)
item.content:encoded: Loved the blog and the pics. This trip has been on my bucket list for ages. Hope you’re penning a coffee table book for wannabe US road-trippers like me;)

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/road-tripping-usa/#comment-19379">Phil Duff</a>.
Thanks dad x

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/road-tripping-usa/#comment-19447">Gabriel</a>.
Thanks Gabriel! We would have loved to visit Sonoma but we didn't have time on this trip. We've already made notes for places we need to visit the next time we road trip in the US!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Gabriel.

Thanks Gabriel! We would have loved to visit Sonoma but we didn’t have time on this trip. We’ve already made notes for places we need to visit the next time we road trip in the US!

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/road-tripping-usa/#comment-20459">Andrea</a>.
Hi Andrea, it really depends on how much you want to spend - camping is cheap, motels are affordable and then there are obviously pricey hotels. Car rental is pretty cheap and so is gas.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andrea.

Hi Andrea, it really depends on how much you want to spend – camping is cheap, motels are affordable and then there are obviously pricey hotels. Car rental is pretty cheap and so is gas.
